title: Year 2 Fractions Lesson
summary: Using pizza slices to model halves and quarters.
details: In this lesson, I used paper plate manipulatives and storytelling to explore fractions. Students cut, shared, and reflected on the fairness of different divisions.

title: Prep Literacy Activity
summary: Initial sounds using a puppet game.
details: Students helped a puppet find objects starting with a letter. This integrated play-based learning and phonological awareness.
